Bases: object

Service for file system operations related to sorting.

repo (IWalkerRepo)

Initializes the file operations service.

Parameters:

repo (IWalkerRepo) – Repository for file system operations.

copy_file_to_category_structure(file, categories, target_root)[source]

Copies file to target structure based on categories.

Parameters:

  • file (File) – File to be copied.

  • categories (List[str]) – List of category names for directory structure.

  • target_root (str) – Root target directory.

Return type:

str

Returns:

Full path to the copied file.

_build_category_path(target_root, categories, filename)[source]

Builds target path based on categories.

Parameters:

  • target_root (str) – Root target directory.

  • categories (List[str]) – List of category names.

  • filename (str) – Name of the file.

Return type:

str

Returns:

Full target path for the file.

Returns:

Walker Service

class WalkerService(repo, source_path, allowed_ext=None, filter_registry=None, file_operations=None, stats_service=None)[source]

Bases: object

Main service orchestrating file sorting operations.

Parameters:

  • source_path (str)

  • allowed_ext (List[str] | None)

  • filter_registry (FilterRegistry | None)

  • file_operations (FileOperationsService)

  • stats_service (StatsService)

__init__(repo, source_path, allowed_ext=None, filter_registry=None, file_operations=None, stats_service=None)[source]

Initializes the WalkerService.

Parameters:

  • repo (IWalkerRepo) – File system repository.

  • source_path (str) – Source directory path.

  • allowed_ext (Optional[List[str]]) – List of allowed file extensions.

  • filter_registry (FilterRegistry | None) – Registry for filter management.

  • file_operations (FileOperationsService) – Service for file operations.

  • stats_service (StatsService) – Service for statistics tracking.

sort_by(filters_config, dest=None)[source]

Sorts files using specified filters and configuration.

Parameters:

  • filters_config (List[Dict[str, Any]]) – List of filter configurations.

  • dest (str | None) – Optional destination directory path.

Return type:

Directory

Returns:

Directory tree representing the sorted file structure.

Raises:

Exception – If any error occurs during sorting.

Processes a single file through the sorting pipeline.

  • composite_filter (CompositeFilter) – Composite filter for categorization.

  • stats (Dict[str, Any]) – Statistics dictionary to update.

None
